title: Refactor SimulationEngine to remove static t=0 snapshot trap
description: SimulationEngine.run() uses network_graph (t=0 only), conflicting with AGENTS.md NO STATIC SNAPSHOTS. Rename network_graph to graph_at_t0 or deprecate; refactor run() to use temporal loop or remove if Tier1 rollout is canonical. See docs/codereview/2025-12-13_last-8-commits_tier1-temporal-gcc.md #4

title: Enforce schema validation at write-time in export scripts
description: validate_runs_schema/validate_steps_schema exist but scripts write CSV without calling them. Create single writer function that validates before writing. Update export_design_dataset.py, export_failure_dataset.py. See docs/codereview/2025-12-13_last-8-commits_tier1-temporal-gcc.md #3

title: Remove runtime sys.path patching and verbose prints from production modules
description: engine.py modifies sys.path at import time; hypatia_adapter.py prints status/warnings. Move path patches to scripts/ only; use logging or verbosity flag instead of print(). See docs/codereview/2025-12-13_last-8-commits_tier1-temporal-gcc.md #5

title: Fix tier1_rollout.py docstring (claims no Hypatia imports but has them)
description: Module docstring says 'No Hypatia imports in this module' but run_tier1_rollout() imports HypatiaAdapter. Align docstring with reality or split contracts vs runner into separate modules. See docs/codereview/2025-12-13_last-8-commits_tier1-temporal-gcc.md #7

title: Consider longer config_hash (currently truncated to 16 chars)
description: Tier1RolloutConfig.config_hash() truncates SHA256 to 16 hex chars, increasing collision risk for long-lived datasets. Consider keeping full hash or at least 32 chars. See docs/codereview/2025-12-13_last-8-commits_tier1-temporal-gcc.md #8

title: Consider Parquet for canonical dataset output (v1 uses CSV)
description: Scripts export CSV; schema doc implies DataFrame/Parquet flows. Parquet offers better type safety and hashing for reproducibility. Either bless CSV for v1 explicitly or switch to Parquet in canonical writer. See docs/codereview/2025-12-13_last-8-commits_tier1-temporal-gcc.md #6

title: Tier1-only temporal GCC refactor (v1)
description: Epic: Eliminate the Two Worlds pipeline split by making Tier 1 (Hypatia-based) temporal pipeline the only supported simulation/data path in src/. See docs/refactor_plans/unified_refactor_plan_tier1_temporal_gcc.md

title: Step 1: Create pure labeling/metrics module
description: Add src/satnet/metrics/labels.py with pure functions: compute_num_components, compute_gcc_size, compute_gcc_frac, compute_partitioned, aggregate_partition_streaks. No Hypatia dependency. Unit tests validate empty graph handling, connected graph gcc_frac==1, two-component graph gcc_frac<1.

title: Step 10: Update risk model training to match Tier 1 temporal labels
description: Update src/satnet/models/risk_model.py to define v1 feature columns (design-time inputs only) and v1 labels (partition_any or partition_fraction > X). Training can load v1 runs table without referencing removed toy columns.

title: Step 11: Add regression tests for Tier 1-only contract
description: Add tests: test_no_toy_imports (verify no src/ module imports satnet.network.topology), test_rollout_shapes (verify temporal rollout output shapes). Tests run fast and pass locally/CI.

title: Step 2: Define rollout config + results contract (dataclasses)
description: Add src/satnet/simulation/tier1_rollout.py with Tier1RolloutConfig, Tier1RolloutStep, and Tier1RolloutSummary dataclasses. Establish stable API for temporal evaluation. Smoke test can instantiate without importing toy topology.

title: Step 3: Add graph iterator to HypatiaAdapter
description: Add iter_graphs(start_t, end_t, step_seconds) to HypatiaAdapter. Simplify time-loop logic, reuse existing caches (_isl_data), avoid re-parsing TLEs per step. Tiny rollout can iterate graphs without exceptions.

title: Step 4: Implement temporal Tier 1 rollout runner
description: Implement run_tier1_rollout(cfg) -> (steps, summary) in tier1_rollout.py. Construct HypatiaAdapter, generate TLEs, calculate ISLs, sample failures from t=0 graph, loop t=0..T computing GCC metrics, aggregate into summary. Demo non-trivial gcc_frac[t] curve.

title: Step 5: Refactor Monte Carlo to Tier 1 dataset generator
description: Rewrite src/satnet/simulation/monte_carlo.py to generate Tier 1 rollouts. Add Tier1MonteCarloConfig and generate_tier1_temporal_dataset(cfg) -> (runs_rows, steps_rows). Module imports must NOT reference satnet.network.topology.

title: Step 6: Remove toy topology generator from src/
description: Delete or relocate src/satnet/network/topology.py. If preserved, move to tests-only location. No references to satnet.network.topology in src/ or scripts/.

title: Step 7: Update scripts to use Tier 1 dataset generator
description: Update scripts/export_failure_dataset.py, scripts/failure_sweep.py, scripts/export_design_dataset.py to use Tier 1 temporal dataset generator. Outputs land under data/ and include both runs table and steps table.

title: Step 8: Define and enforce v1 dataset schema
description: Add docs/datasets/tier1_temporal_connectivity_v1_schema.md defining required columns. Add schema validation that asserts required fields exist before writing. Writer refuses to write if required fields are missing.

title: Step 9: Refactor SimulationEngine to stop being static t=0 holder
description: Update src/satnet/simulation/engine.py to expose time steps via passthrough get_graph_at_step(t) API or generator iter_graphs(). No other module relies on engine.network_graph being a single snapshot.

title: Fix time-step contract mismatch (num_steps semantics)
description: Tier1RolloutConfig.num_steps uses duration//step, but HypatiaAdapter uses duration//step+1. Unify to inclusive t=0..T convention. Update config property, adapter, and tests. See docs/codereview/2025-12-13_last-8-commits_tier1-temporal-gcc.md #2

title: Fix determinism: add explicit epoch to Tier1RolloutConfig
description: WalkerDeltaConfig.epoch defaults to datetime.utcnow(), violating reproducibility. Add explicit epoch param to Tier1RolloutConfig, include in config_hash, default to fixed constant. See docs/codereview/2025-12-13_last-8-commits_tier1-temporal-gcc.md #1
